title: Alex Ruoff reads his story on the right-to-try fight over psychedelics
description: On this special weekend edition of On The Merits, Bloomberg Law reporter Alex Ruoff reads his story about terminally ill patients fighting the DEA for the right to use psychedelic drugs. Click here to read the story in print.
itunes:author: Bloomberg Law
